name: Charter Communications, Inc.
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. is a leading American telecommunications and mass media company operating under the Spectrum brand. Headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, Charter provides broadband internet, cable TV, mobile, and voice services to over 32 million customers in 41 states, making it one of the largest cable operators in the U.S. The company is publicly traded on NASDAQ under the ticker CHTR and ranked 76th on the 2024 Fortune 500 list.
